TaskDescription.Detail: Launch the notepad app and get the values of texts, lists and radio buttons.

Assist.value: Launch the notepad app.
Enter the command of the notepad execution. Type 'notepad'.
Click Run below to launch the notepad.
Click 'Edit' in the menu.
After double-click the highlighted box, click 'Edit'.
Click 'Time/Date'.
After double-click the highlighted box, press the Control key to disable image recognition and click 'Edit'. Then press the Control key again to enable image recognition and click 'Time/Date'.
Get text from the notepad.
After double-click the highlighted box, click the input area of the notepad.
Specify a variable to store the text in the input area. Type this.Text.
Print and check the text.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.Text.
Click 'Format' in the menu.
After double-click the highlighted box, click 'Format'.
Click 'Font'.
After double-click the highlighted box, press the Control key to disable image recognition and click 'Format'. Then press the Control key again to enable image recognition and click 'Font'.
Get items from the font list.
After double-click the highlighted box, click the font list.
Specify a variable to store the font list. Type this.Fonts.
Print and check the list.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.Fonts.
Close the 'Font' pop-up.
After double-click the highlighted box, click the close button.
Click 'File' in the menu.
After double-click the highlighted box, click 'File'.
Click 'Page Setup'.
After double-click the highlighted box, press the Control key to disable image recognition and click 'File'. Then press the Control key again to enable image recognition and click 'Page Setup'.
Get which page orientation is checked.
After double-click the highlighted box, click the area of 'Portrait' radio button.
Specify a variable to store the value of the radio button. Type this.IsVertical.
Print and check if the page is portrait oriention.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.IsVertical.
Get which page orientation is checked.
After double-click the highlighted box, click the area of 'Landscape' radio button.
Specify a variable to store the value of the radio button. Type this.IsHorizontal.
Print and check if the page is landscape oriention.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.IsHorizontal.
Close the 'Page Setup' pop-up.
After double-click the highlighted box, click the close button.
Close the notepad app.
